actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain land acquired for flood-control purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes be disposed of as surplus property.

summary.text: Provides that real property acquired by the United States for flood-control purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes, as determined by the Secretary of the Army, be declared to be surplus property for purposes of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act. Stipulates that preference in the purchase of such property be given to those who owned it just prior to its acquisition by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain land acquired for flood-control purposes which is no longer needed for such purposes be disposed of as surplus property.
